name: rfc6902
description: Complete implementation of RFC6902 (patch and diff)
author: Christopher Brown <io@henrian.com> (http://henrian.com)

scripts.dist: tsc -t ES2015 -m es2015 && rollup index.js --output.format umd --name rfc6902 --output.file dist/rfc6902.js && closure-compiler dist/rfc6902.js > dist/rfc6902.min.js
